content:
Craft an item of type: gray_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 15}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 35, "index": 16}, {"type": "light_blue_terracotta", "quantity": 41, "index": 17}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 18}, {"type": "cactus", "quantity": 26, "index": 32}, {"type": "coal_ore", "quantity": 62, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft the gray terracotta, I need to place the gray dye in the middle of a 3x3 grid of terracotta. Therefore, I will start by moving the terracotta at slot 18 to the top left of the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Next, I will move another terracotta block to the right of the one already in the crafting grid (slot 2).
Ok
act: move from slot 18 to slot 2 with quantity 1
